Class SemanticError

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.binghamton.jhelp.error.JHelpError
      • com.binghamton.jhelp.error.SemanticError
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TypeMismatchError

    public class SemanticError
extends JHelpError
    A class to represent semantic errors

        ast - the offending AST
        msg - the message explaining the error
        suggestion - the suggestion suggesting a fix to the error
